msg.msgText:
The IBM MessageSight protocol configurations can be viewed by using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show Protocol help imaserver show Protocol "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver show Protocol "Name=mqtt"
The following configuration items are returned: Name Name of the protocol. ActionList Comma-delimited list of allowed actions.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
